tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "7373FAF14DA5F7A087114284F659D3BB", "The Mayor has initiated a Buy Order. Buy Orders are a way to exchange materials for Node Currency. Delivered materials are converted into Node Resources, which help Nodes develop and grow.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "A5858CE54518709541F03DAD03A3EF92", "Speak to a Requisition Agent to view and contribute to a Node\'s Buy Orders. You don\'t need to be a citizen to contribute, so be sure to check the Buy Orders often on your travels.")
